internal_error.description: Something went wrong on server. Please contact server admin.

invalid_key.description: Valid api key is required. Please provide a valid api key along with request.

invalid_auth.description: Valid auth token is required. Please provide a valid auth token along with request.

invalid_permission.description: Permission denied. Current user does not has required permissions for this resource.

invalid_access.description: Access denied. Current user does not has access for this resource.

invalid_input.description: The request input is not as expected by API. Please provide valid input.

input_too_large.description: The request input size is larger than allowed.

invalid_input_format.description: The request input format is not allowed.

invalid_operation.description: Requested operation is not allowed due to applied rules. Please refer to error details.

not_found.description: The resource referenced by request does not exists.

invalid_login.description: Login credentials do not match any registered user.

conflict.description: It seems like details provided already exists with us.
